name: Kinduo 2 - Frostbite
description:
Kinduo 2 is a local co-op game where two elemental friends with unique abilities need to help each other to overcome obstacles! Create blocks of ice, burn or melt things, and combine your skills to create plants!

  • Freeze, burn, melt and bloom!


  • Single-Player!


  • Co-op Local! (Offline)


  • 50 stages with more than 10 different mechanics!


  • 2 characters with several unique abilities!


  • Play in 3 different biomes!
